trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Solon
There was one other sighting in Solon on or around November 11th 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving on 271 headed South approximately 815 I watched this craft ahead of me to my right it was on a singular course. I noticed a bar of lights on either side. Suddenly one bar of lights disappeared and the other bar stayed visible. I thought maybe it was a plane banking, but then the other bar of lights reappeared and I noticed the craft had not changed course. This continued to happen for approx 15 mins as I drove. Suddenly the craft appeared to stop and became stationary and I passed it. The craft would have been in the vicinity or even slightly east of Solon. Auburn or Russeltownship area. Personally I feel it may have been an experimental military craft of some sort.
Summary: Row of lights either side disappearing and alternating then it stopped mid air
